name: Bryn

Second Wind.description: Once per short rest, you can use a bonus action to regain 1d10 + your Fighter level in hit points.

ability_score_increase.description: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

languages: One extra language of your choice
equipment: A cracked hourglass, a set of rusty manacles, a half-empty bottle, a hunting trap, a gaming set (matching your chosen proficiency), a set of traveler's clothes, and a pouch containing 13 gp
